function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear definition of modes of existence in socio-technical networks","Impact":"Confusion and ambiguity in understanding the roles and associations of different elements in the built environment","Mitigation":"Clear and standardized definitions of modes of existence","Technologies":"Standardized ontological frameworks and modeling tools","People":"Researchers, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, ontology experts"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of the impact of socio-technical networks on disease propagation","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to the spread of contagious diseases in smart cities","Mitigation":"Comprehensive risk assessments of socio-technical networks and their impact on disease transmission","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, network analysis tools","People":"Urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Public health agencies, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on the historical trajectory of technical objects in relation to disease outbreaks","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of how historical developments in technology influence disease propagation","Mitigation":"Incorporation of historical analysis into the study of socio-technical networks in relation to disease outbreaks","Technologies":"Historical data analysis tools, research databases","People":"Historians, researchers, technologists","Owner":"Historical research institutions, academic institutions"}]}
